about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME
Run your way as far as you can in RampageRunners. Where you dodge and smash through obstacles in chase of the highest score. The game features a auto-runner game mechanic. Where you move left and right to dodge obstacles, or dash to smash right through them! If you play well enough you will meet the final boss in a final battle and earn many bonus points.


ABOUT THE DEVELOPER
I’m a solo developer starting to learn how to create games and releasing them on steam. With time I hope to create better games. But for now perhaps just one other person can have some fun with my games while I continue my journey. The game is completely free!

name: RampageRunner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 with 6GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 3060 or AMD RX 6600-XT with 6GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Run your way as far as you can in RampageRunners. Where you dodge and smash through obstacles in chase of the highest score.
